title: ddosed?
body:
I never get connection issues with the game.
In a ranked game I disconnected at 17 minutes. 10 minutes later I was able to gain access to my internet again. Checking the match history the game ended at 27 minutes. Coincidence or ddos?

replies.body:
[DDoS](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Denial-of-service_attack) requires a bit of resources that typically don't find their way to a typical enemy opponent. For this reason, it's unlikely this was a DDoS, as your entire network connection would be unusable during the entire time you were trying to reconnect.

Typically, these types of issues are spawned from incompatible network settings that cause your PC to drop its connection to our servers. I strongly encourage you to work through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure everything is good on your local end. Let me know if those steps helped.

>  it's unlikely this was a DDoS, as your entire network connection would be unusable during the entire time you were trying to reconnect.

Well, that's kinda how I understood "10 minutes later I was able to gain access to **my internet** again". He said "my internet", not "my game".
